Title: WPFTrees
Description: WPF Trees project is software for visualization of phylogenies, using Microsoft  WPF framework.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WPF Trees project is software for visualization of phylogenies, using Microsoft WPF framework.

GUI Application allowing users to view, edit and publish phylogenies in newick format.
Features
- radial, rectangular and cladogram layouts
- text and image comments

For what's planned next, see roadmap. Feel free to discuss priorities and request new features :)
